snippet.title: Beyond Castle Wolfenstein - 1984 - Atari 8bit
snippet.description: Wolfenstein was still a great game in 1984, but it is till annoying the way the game handles when the player hits the wall. The shooting mechanics and the in game instructions could be also clearer. Too bad that in contrast to the development of the SSI games, there was no clear improvement in the formula between 1981 and 1984.
